info.longBusinessSummary: Asahi Intecc Co., Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of medical devices in Japan, the United States, Europe, China, and internationally. The company operates through the Medical and Device segments. It provides percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI) guide wires, guiding catheters, balloon catheters, and penetration catheters for cardiology; peripheral guide wires, IVR guide wires, micro catheters, and cerebrovascular system guide wires for peripheral vascular, abdominal vascular, and cerebrovascular systems; and catheters for angiography. The company also offers OEM ODM service services for medical devices; and medical and industrial components, such as wire rope, coils, coatings, tubes, terminal processing products, synchronous round belt, and flexible shaft. In addition, it develops, manufactures, and sells ultra-fine stainless steel wire ropes. The company was formerly known as Asahi Mini Rope Sales Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Asahi Intecc Co., Ltd. in July 1988. Asahi Intecc Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1976 and is headquartered in Seto, Japan.
